text: Abu Bakar Kamara (also Abu Bakarr Kamara) was born on July 29, 1929. He was First Vice President of Sierra Leone from 1987 to 199. He served under president Joseph Saidu Momoh. He and Second Vice President Salia Jusu-Sheriff resigned in September 1991.Africa South of the Sahara 2004 By Europa Publications via GoogleBooks ==References== Category:Vice-presidents of Sierra Leone Category:Living people Category:1929 births
title: Abu Bakar Kamara
